title: Arc digital Landing page
description: I created this landing page for Arc Digital Marketing Agency with a focus on clean design, smooth animations, and a layout that feels both modern and easy to navigate. The goal was to capture the creative vibe of the brand while keeping things simple and user-friendly.

title: Berso
description: Berso is a platform built for Ethiopia, similar to Yelp, designed to help users discover and rate local businesses. The app integrates Google Maps API to easily search for businesses, rate them, and help small businesses gain visibility. It serves as a review and recommendations platform to enhance the discoverability of small businesses across the region. [There will be a an apk file for android in the demo link]

title: Berso Admin Dashboard
description: Berso Admin Dashboard is a platform built inorder to let admins perform CRUD on the  data displayed on the Berso App.

title: Zewd Management System
description: A role-based dashboard created for employees at Zewd to manage student and employee information. It includes user authentication, CRUD operations for both student and employee records, an attendance module, and student report module

title: Merit Learning Management System
description: A Learning Management System (LMS) that includes user management, authentication, course management, and payment integration via Chapa.
